00015 // THIS FILE CONTAINS DEFINITIONS FOR TILESET FILES

00017 void SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues();
00018 void SetTilesetFourTerrainValues();

00020 // Snap: This global gives the number of tilesets in JA2SET.DAT
00021 // It is properly initialized in InitEngineTilesets,
00022 // where it is read from JA2SET.DAT header.
00023 UINT8 gubNumSets = MAX_TILESETS;
00024 
00025 TILESET      gTilesets[ MAX_TILESETS ];
00026 
00027 
00028 void InitEngineTilesets( )
00029 {
00030       UINT32            cnt, cnt2, uiNumFiles;
00031 //    FILE                          *hfile;
00032       HWFILE                  hfile;
00033       CHAR8             zName[32];
00034       UINT32            uiNumBytesRead;
00035 
00036       //OPEN FILE
00037 //    hfile = fopen( "BINARYDATA\\JA2SET.DAT", "rb" );
00038       hfile = FileOpen( "BINARYDATA\\JA2SET.DAT", FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00039       if ( !hfile  )
00040       {
00041             SET_ERROR( "Cannot open tileset data file" );
00042             return;
00043       }
00044 
00045             
00046       // READ # TILESETS and compare
00047 //    fread( &gubNumSets, sizeof( gubNumSets ), 1, hfile );
00048       FileRead( hfile, &gubNumSets, sizeof( gubNumSets ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00049       // CHECK
00050       if ( gubNumSets > MAX_TILESETS )
00051       {
00052             // Report error
00053             SET_ERROR( "Too many tilesets in the data file" );
00054             return;
00055       }
00056 
00057       // READ #files
00058 //    fread( &uiNumFiles, sizeof( uiNumFiles ), 1, hfile );
00059       FileRead( hfile, &uiNumFiles, sizeof( uiNumFiles ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00060 
00061       // COMPARE
00062       if ( uiNumFiles != NUMBEROFTILETYPES )
00063       {
00064             // Report error
00065             SET_ERROR( "Number of tilesets slots in code does not match data file" );
00066             return;
00067       }
00068 
00069 
00070       // Loop through each tileset, load name then files
00071       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < gubNumSets; cnt++ )
00072       {
00073             //Read name
00074 //          fread( &zName, sizeof( zName ), 1, hfile );
00075             FileRead( hfile, &zName, sizeof( zName ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00076 
00077             // Read ambience value
00078 //          fread( &(gTilesets[ cnt ].ubAmbientID), sizeof( UINT8), 1, hfile );
00079             FileRead( hfile, &(gTilesets[ cnt ].ubAmbientID), sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00080 
00081             // Set into tileset 
00082             swprintf( (wchar_t *)gTilesets[ cnt ].zName, L"%S", zName );
00083 
00084             // Loop for files
00085             for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < uiNumFiles; cnt2++ )
00086             {
00087                   // Read file name
00088 //                fread( &zName, sizeof( zName ), 1, hfile );
00089                   FileRead( hfile, &zName, sizeof( zName ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00090 
00091                   // Set into database
00092                   strcpy( gTilesets[ cnt ].TileSurfaceFilenames[ cnt2 ], zName );
00093 
00094             }
00095 
00096       }
00097 
00098 //    fclose( hfile );
00099       FileClose( hfile );
00100 
00101 
00102       // SET CALLBACK FUNTIONS!!!!!!!!!!!!!
00103       gTilesets[ TLS_CAVES_1 ].MovementCostFnc                    = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetTwoTerrainValues;
00104       gTilesets[ TLS_AIRSTRIP ].MovementCostFnc                   = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues;
00105       gTilesets[ TLS_DEAD_AIRSTRIP ].MovementCostFnc  = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues;
00106       gTilesets[ TLS_PALACE ].MovementCostFnc                     = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues;
00107       gTilesets[ TLS_BALIME ].MovementCostFnc                     = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues;
00108       gTilesets[ TLS_BALIME_MUSEUM ].MovementCostFnc                    = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues;
00109       gTilesets[ TLS_QUEENS_TROPICAL ].MovementCostFnc                        = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues;
00110       gTilesets[ TLS_MEDUNA_INNER_TOWN ].MovementCostFnc                      = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues;
00111       gTilesets[ TLS_QUEENS_SAM ].MovementCostFnc                       = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues;
00112       gTilesets[ TLS_QUEENS_AIRPORT ].MovementCostFnc                   = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues;
00113 
00114       gTilesets[ TLS_TROPICAL_1 ].MovementCostFnc                 = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetFourTerrainValues;
00115       gTilesets[ TLS_DESERT_SAM ].MovementCostFnc                       = (TILESET_CALLBACK)SetTilesetFourTerrainValues;
00116 }

00121 void SetTilesetOneTerrainValues( )
00122 {
00123             // FIRST TEXUTRES
00124             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00125             gTileSurfaceArray[ SECONDTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00126             gTileSurfaceArray[ THIRDTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00127             gTileSurfaceArray[ FOURTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00128             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIFTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_GRASS;
00129             gTileSurfaceArray[ SIXTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_GRASS;
00130             gTileSurfaceArray[ SEVENTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00131             gTileSurfaceArray[ REGWATERTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_WATER;
00132             gTileSurfaceArray[ DEEPWATERTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = DEEP_WATER;
00133 
00134             // NOW ROADS
00135             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTROAD ]->ubTerrainID = DIRT_ROAD;
00136             gTileSurfaceArray[ ROADPIECES ]->ubTerrainID = DIRT_ROAD;
00137 
00138             // NOW FLOORS
00139             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00140             gTileSurfaceArray[ SECONDFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00141             gTileSurfaceArray[ THIRDFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00142             gTileSurfaceArray[ FOURTHFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00143 
00144             // NOW ANY TERRAIN MODIFYING DEBRIS
00145 
00146 }
00147

00149 void SetTilesetTwoTerrainValues( )
00150 {
00151             // FIRST TEXUTRES
00152             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00153             gTileSurfaceArray[ SECONDTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00154             gTileSurfaceArray[ THIRDTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00155             gTileSurfaceArray[ FOURTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00156             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIFTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_GRASS;
00157             gTileSurfaceArray[ SIXTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_GRASS;
00158             gTileSurfaceArray[ SEVENTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00159             gTileSurfaceArray[ REGWATERTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_WATER;
00160             gTileSurfaceArray[ DEEPWATERTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = DEEP_WATER;
00161 
00162             // NOW ROADS
00163             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTROAD ]->ubTerrainID = DIRT_ROAD;
00164             gTileSurfaceArray[ ROADPIECES ]->ubTerrainID = DIRT_ROAD;
00165 
00166 
00167             // NOW FLOORS
00168             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00169             gTileSurfaceArray[ SECONDFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00170             gTileSurfaceArray[ THIRDFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00171             gTileSurfaceArray[ FOURTHFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00172 
00173 }

00176 void SetTilesetThreeTerrainValues( )
00177 {
00178             // DIFFERENCE FROM #1 IS THAT ROADS ARE PAVED
00179 
00180             // FIRST TEXUTRES
00181             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00182             gTileSurfaceArray[ SECONDTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00183             gTileSurfaceArray[ THIRDTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00184             gTileSurfaceArray[ FOURTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00185             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIFTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_GRASS;
00186             gTileSurfaceArray[ SIXTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_GRASS;
00187             gTileSurfaceArray[ SEVENTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00188             gTileSurfaceArray[ REGWATERTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_WATER;
00189             gTileSurfaceArray[ DEEPWATERTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = DEEP_WATER;
00190 
00191             // NOW ROADS
00192             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTROAD ]->ubTerrainID = PAVED_ROAD;
00193             gTileSurfaceArray[ ROADPIECES ]->ubTerrainID = PAVED_ROAD;
00194 
00195 
00196             // NOW FLOORS
00197             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00198             gTileSurfaceArray[ SECONDFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00199             gTileSurfaceArray[ THIRDFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00200             gTileSurfaceArray[ FOURTHFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00201 
00202             // NOW ANY TERRAIN MODIFYING DEBRIS
00203 
00204 }

00206 void SetTilesetFourTerrainValues( )
00207 {
00208             // DIFFERENCE FROM #1 IS THAT FLOOR2 IS NOT FLAT_FLOOR BUT FLAT_GROUND
00209 
00210             // FIRST TEXUTRES
00211             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00212             gTileSurfaceArray[ SECONDTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00213             gTileSurfaceArray[ THIRDTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00214             gTileSurfaceArray[ FOURTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00215             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIFTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_GRASS;
00216             gTileSurfaceArray[ SIXTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_GRASS;
00217             gTileSurfaceArray[ SEVENTHTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00218             gTileSurfaceArray[ REGWATERTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = LOW_WATER;
00219             gTileSurfaceArray[ DEEPWATERTEXTURE ]->ubTerrainID = DEEP_WATER;
00220 
00221             // NOW ROADS
00222             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTROAD ]->ubTerrainID = DIRT_ROAD;
00223             gTileSurfaceArray[ ROADPIECES ]->ubTerrainID = DIRT_ROAD;
00224 
00225 
00226             // NOW FLOORS
00227             gTileSurfaceArray[ FIRSTFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00228             gTileSurfaceArray[ SECONDFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_GROUND;
00229             gTileSurfaceArray[ THIRDFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00230             gTileSurfaceArray[ FOURTHFLOOR ]->ubTerrainID = FLAT_FLOOR;
00231 
00232             // NOW ANY TERRAIN MODIFYING DEBRIS
00233 
00234 }
